Eduroam & Guest Access
IIT Jodhpur provides Eduroam and Guest Internet Access facility to visitors from other institutions and guest users.
Visitor from other institutions may connect “eduroam” SSID through their access credentials.
The guest may request for access credentials through department or host from IIT Jodhpur to access internet via SSID “IITJ_Guest”.

The guest configure the eduroam WPA-2 Enterprise Wireless Network through below links:
(i)Linux(ii)Windows(iii)Mac(iv)Mobile

Address
Digital Infrastructure & AutomationComputer Center,Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur,NH 62 Nagaur Road, Karwar 342030,Jodhpur District
